member.name: WIN32_FIND_STREAM_DATA
member.summary: Contains information about the stream found by the or function.

member.name: WIN32_FIND_STREAM_DATA.StreamSize
member.summary: A value that specifies the size of the stream, in bytes.

member.name: WIN32_FIND_STREAM_DATA.cStreamName
member.summary: The name of the stream. The string name format is ":streamname:$streamtype".
